title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Apr. 16, 1892. Students of St. Stanislaus Kostki's School Present Variety Program Tuesday

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Apr. 16, 1892. STUDENTS OF ST. STANISLAUS KOSTKI'S SCHOOL PRESENT VARIETY PROGRAM TUESDAY

body.p: On Tuesday, April 19, the children of St. Stanislaus Kostki's school will present a variety program of entertainment at the school hall, Noble and Bradley Streets. The program will begin at 3:30 P. M. Admission will be twenty-five cents. The program will be as follows:
1. Introduction march: "Golden Voices," Misses A. Malinska and C. Kacinska.
3. Piano Duo: "Redowa," Misses N. Carrol and M. Klosowska.
7. Piano duo: "Bouquet," Misses A. Malinska and P. Krolik.
Misses B. Gordon, F. Kalinska, and M. Kurkowska.
10. Piano duo, "Norma," Misses N. Carrol and F. Kosinska.
13. Piano duo: "Vision of Paradise" Misses A. Malinska and B. Gordon.
14. Sketch: Misses A. Busgieska and J. Grzadzinska.
16. Piano duo: "Wild Roses," Misses M. Klosowska and M. Galonski.
18. Piano duo: "Gallop," Misses C. Kasinska and M. Carrol.
